thread.title: David Beckham Stared Down A Studio Camera: Here's What We Know
thread.title_full: David Beckham Stared Down A Studio Camera: Here's What We Know

author: James Cave
title: David Beckham Stared Down A Studio Camera: Here's What We Know
text:
David Beckham Stared Down A Studio Camera: Here's What We Know He had nothing to lose. Everything to gain. James Cave Lifestyle Staff Writer, The Huffington Post Posted: 10/22/2015 05:29 PM EDT 
It's no secret that David Beckham can bend it . 
But his game face is in a whole other arena. Nothing could prepare onlookers for what went down when the retired footballer and cologne-maker walked into a dressing room and faced off with his hardest opponent yet: a huge camera. 
Who won this ultimate staring contest? Check out the intense photos below: David Beckham 
6:02 p.m.: Beckham arrives in a casual shirt, but looks anything but relaxed once he spots his opponent across the room. DeshaCAM via Getty Images 
6:03 p.m.: Camera starts off strong -- for a second it looked like Beckham would blink, or possibly crack a smile, but no! He remained solid while he took off his shirt. David Beckham 
6:15 p.m.: Oh, but camera was bolstered by support from his coach! Could Beckham possibly lose this one while he puts on a green jacket?! audioundwerbung via Getty Images 
6:21 p.m.: NO! HE MADE IT. Clear eyes and looking sharp. But next comes the hard part. The tuxedo. Can Beckham Go All The Way?! David Beckham Jamie McDonald via Getty Images audioundwerbung via Getty Images Laurence Griffiths via Getty Images smutnypan via Getty Images Karwai Tang via Getty Images SambaPhoto/Mario Fontes via Getty Images Europa Press via Getty Images 
10:36 p.m.: GASP. NO. He couldn't hang. The camera was just too much for Becks. Good thing he sure looks nice in a suit. Winner: camera. nikkytok via Getty Images
